Association: Allele C is not associated with increased response to citalopram, fluoxetine, mirtazapine, paroxetine, Selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors or venlafaxine in people with Mood Disorders as compared to allele A.
More Details: One of the studies included in this meta-analysis was a "Naturalistic pharmacogenetic study".
